hadiths.text: Narrated Um Al-Fadl:(daughter of Al-Harith) that she sent a bowl of milk to the Prophet (ﷺ) while he was standing (at `Arafat) in the afternoon of the Day of `Arafat. He took it in his hands and drank it. Narrated Abu Nadr: The Prophet was on the back of his camel

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ شَرِبَ وَهْوَ وَاقِفٌ عَلَى بَعِيرِهِ
chapter.eng-name: To drink while on the back of camel
